title: Time Warner Rebuffs Rupert Murdoch's Big-Dollar Bid For Media Giant
teaser: Time Warner has rejected a buyout offer, reportedly as high as $80 billion, from Rupert Murdoch's 21st Century Fox. A deal between the two companies would create a media powerhouse â€” and a thicket of challenges for anti-trust regulators.
